Verses: 1 AISUVARIYAVAANGALE, KELUNGAL, UNGALMEL VARUM NIRPPANDHANGALINIMITHTHAM ALARI AZHUNGAL.
2 UNGAL AISUVARIYAM AZHINDHU, UNGAL VASTHIRANGAL POTTARITHTHUPPOYINA.
3 UNGAL PONNUM VELLIYUM THURUPPIDITHTHADHU; AVAIGALILULLA THURU UNGALUKKU VIRODHAMAAGA SAATCHIYAAYIRUNDHU, AKKINIYAIPPOLA UNGAL MAAMSATHTHAI THINNUM. KADAISINAATKALILE POKKISHATHTHAI SERTHTHEERGAL.
4 IDHO, UNGAL VAYALGALAI ARUTHTHA VELAIKKAARARUDAIYA KOOLI UNGALAAL ANIYAAYAMAAIP PIDIKKAPPATTU KOOKKURALIDUGIRADHU; ARUTHTHAVARGALUDAIYA, KOOKKURAL SENAIGALUDAIYA KARTHTHARIN SEVIGALIL PATTADHU.
5 BOOMIYILE NEENGAL SAMPIRAMAMAAI VAAZHNDHU, SUGABOGATHTHIL UZHANDREERGAL; KOZHUTHTHAVAIGALAI ADIKKUM NAALIL NADAKKIRADHUPOLA UNGAL IRUDHAYANGALAI POSHITHTHEERGAL.
6 NEEDHIMAANAI NEENGAL AAKKINAIKKULLAAGATH THEERTHTHU KOLAISEYDHEERGAL; AVAN UNGALODE EDHIRTHTHU NIRKAVILLAI.

7 IPPADIYIRUKKA, SAGODHARARE, KARTHTHAR VARUMALAVUM NEEDIYA PORUMAIYAAYIRUNGAL. IDHO, PAYIRIDUGIRAVAN BOOMIYIN NARPALANAI ADAIYAVENDUMENDRU, MUNMAARIYUM PINMAARIYUM VARUMALAVUM, NEEDIYA PORUMAIYODE KAATHTHIRUKKIRAAN.
8 NEENGALUM NEEDIYA PORUMAIYODIRUNDHU, UNGAL IRUDHAYANGALAI STHIRAPPADUTHTHUNGAL; KARTHTHARIN VARUGAI SAMEEBAMAAYIRUKKIRADHE.
9 SAGODHARARE, NEENGAL NIYAAYANDHEERKKAPPADAADHAPADIKKU ORUVARUKKORUVAR VIRODHAMAAI MURAIYIDAADHIRUNGAL; IDHO, NIYAAYAADHIPADHI VAASARPADIYIL NIRKIRAAR.
10 EN SAGODHARARE, KARTHTHARUDAIYA NAAMATHTHINAALE PESINA THEERKKADHARISIGALAI THUNBAPPADUDHALUKKUM NEEDIYA PORUMAIKKUM THIRUSHTAANDHAMAAGA VAITHTHUKKOLLUNGAL.

11 IDHO, PORUMAIYAAYIRUKKIRAVARGALAI BAAKKIYAVAANGALENGIROME! YOBIN PORUMAIYAIKKURITHTHU KELVIPPATTIRUKKIREERGAL;KARTHTHARUDAIYA SEYALIN MUDIVAIYUM KANDIRUKKIREERGAL; KARTHTHAR MIGUNDHA URUKKAMUM IRAKKAMUMULLAVARAAYIRUKKIRAARE.

12 VISESHAMAAI, EN SAGODHARARE, VAANATHTHINPERILAAVADHU, BOOMIYINPERILAAVADHU, VERENDHA AANAIYINAALAAVADHU SATHTHIYAMPANNAADHIRUNGAL; NEENGAL AAKKINAIKKULLAAGA THEERKKAPPADAADHAPADIKKU ULLADHAI ULLADHENDRUM, ILLADHAI ILLADHENDRUM SOLLAKKADAVEERGAL.
13 UNGALIL ORUVAN THUNBAPPATTAAL JEBAMPANNAKKADAVAN; ORUVAN MAGIZHCHCHIYAAYIRUNDHAAL SANGEEDHAM PAADAKKADAVAN.
14 UNGALIL ORUVAN VIYAADHIPPATTAAL, AVAN SABAIYIN MOOPPARGALAI VARAVAZHAIPPAANAAGA; AVARGAL KARTHTHARUDAIYA NAAMATHTHINAALE AVANUKKU ENNAYPOOSI, AVANUKKAAGA JEBAMPANNAKKADAVARGAL.
15 APPOZHUDHU VISUVAASAMULLA JEBAM PINIYAALIYAI RATCHIKKUM; KARTHTHAR AVANAI EZHUPPUVAAR; AVAN PAAVANJEYDHAVANAANAAL ADHU AVANUKKU MANNIKKAPPADUM.
16 NEENGAL SOSTHAMADAIYUMPADIKKU, UNGAL KUTRANGALAI ORUVARUKKORUVAR ARIKKAIYITTU, ORUVARUKKAAGA ORUVAR JEBAMPANNUNGAL. NEEDHIMAAN SEYYUM OOKKAMAANA VENDUDHAL MIGAVUM BELANULLADHAAYIRUKKIRADHU.
17 ELIYAA ENBAVAN NAMMAIPPOLAPPAADULLA MANUSHANAAYIRUNDHUM, MAZHAIPEYYAADHAPADIKKU KARUTHTHAAI JEBAMPANNINAAN, APPOZHUDHU MOONDRUVARUSHAMUM AARUMAADHAMUM BOOMIYINMEL MAZHAI PEYYAVILLAI.
18 MARUPADIYUM JEBAMPANNINAAN, APPOZHUDHU VAANAM MAZHAIYAIP POZHINDHADHU, BOOMI THAN BALANAI THANDHADHU.
19 SAGODHARARE, UNGALIL ORUVAN SATHTHIYATHTHAIVITTU VILAGI MOSAMPOGUMPODHU, MATRORUVAN AVANAITHTHIRUPPINAAL,
20 THAPPIPPONA MAARKKATHTHININDRU PAAVIYAI THIRUPPUGIRAVAN ORU AATHTHUMAAVAI MARANATHTHININDRU RATCHITHTHU, THIRALAANA PAAVANGALAI MOODUVAANENDRU ARIYAKKADAVAN.
